title: Going Barefoot in Greener Grass
description: Be careful when you tread barefoot in greener grass ... you might get stung. For best friends, Olivia and Bethany, life looks a whole lot better on the other side of the picket fence. Olivia had the big Italian wedding and now lives in a cute suburban home with her husband and three children. Bethany broke off her engagement the night before Olivia's wedding and has been single and free ever since. Can their friendship survive as each woman dares to have it all?"In her debut novel, Audry Fryer takes the reader on a fun ride with relatable characters, humor and unexpected plot twists."
author: Audry Fryer
